sentences.english: The third chapter introduces the particular objective in this thesis, Fu Sheng Liu Ji, and its individual translators.

sentences.english: Six Chapters of a Floating Life is an individual memoir of SHEN Fu who lived in QING Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《浮生六记》是清人沈复所著的一部个人回忆录。
